name: scope:public
description: Access to public information about user.

name: scope:user:profile
description: Access to user's profile (i.e. first_name, last_name).

name: scope:location
description: Access to historical location. Applies to all events.

name: scope:vehicle:profile
description: Access to vehicle information (i.e. year, make, model. Applies to all events.

name: scope:vehicle:events
description: Access to real-time vehicle events (i.e. hard_brake, hard_accel).

name: scope:trip
extra: The Trip endpoint requires many scopes to get the complete set of data. scope:trip alone does not give very much, but is required to get anything in the Trip object.

name: scope:adapter:basic
description: Direct bluetooth access to all Adapters on user's account
